column3: “Madam President …” Florentyna had to think quickly to prevent anyone noticing her instinctive response to the words. “It’s one minute past midday.”

At one minute past twelve, Percy stood to attention, slowly raised the Union Jack up the flagpole and delivered the exact words required by the Territories Settlement Act of 1762: “I claim this sovereign territory in the name of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, to whom I swear my allegiance.”
It was the twelfth of December, the twelfth month. A was twelve. The electric clock/radio by his bedside table said 12:01.
